titles.title: Ensuring Access to General Surgery Act of 2017
Ensuring Access to General Surgery Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the designation of general surgery shortage areas, and for other purposes.
Ensuring Access to General Surgery Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
